data.name: Web Host Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord


About the Game


In Web Host Simulator, a simulator with survival, you have to take care of you and at the same time create the a world's largest web hosting company in his small apartment. Build your own headquarters, your own data center and deal with different situations and adverse choices.

Main features

  • Fully functional equipment that can be opened for assembly of new parts;
  • Immersive systems such as FlockOS, an immersive graphical operating system present in computers, and FlockCMD, a command-line-based operating system;
  • Cables with real-time physics simulation;
  • For a good job, you need to take care of your needs;
  • Random events: power and internet failure, damaged equipment, hacker attack, natural disasters and more;
  • Three game modes: Campaign, sandbox and training;
  • Everything around you will influence your productivity and happiness: Living in a good place, buying better equipment and furnitures, can help you;
  • Choose the products that your company will sell: Reseller, VPS, Cloud, Dedicated server or own data center;
  • Other features will be announced in the course of development.

data.short_description: In Web Host Simulator you are a student who has just opened your web hosting company and aims to have your own data center to sell various IT solutions and become the largest information technology company in the world. Build, Configure and Sell!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: +2 GHZ dual core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: +3 GHZ quad core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: INTEL or ARM
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630 or ARM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a Mac Mini M1 2021
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: INTEL or ARM
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630 or ARM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a Mac Mini M1 2021

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: +2 GHZ dual core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD RX 460
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: +3 GHZ dual core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

data.legal_notice: Web Host Simulator is a product of Chibum Ltd.
